s.text: The rest of the British press was largely taken up Monday with fresh argument about the future of the monarchy after Demos, a think tank close to the Tony Blair government, published a report proposing the removal of the queen's last remaining powers and a referendum to decide if Prince Charles should be allowed to succeed her.

The rest of the British press was largely taken up Monday with fresh argument about the future of the monarchy after Demos, a think tank close to the Tony Blair government, published a report proposing the removal of the queen's last remaining powers and a referendum to decide if Prince Charles should be allowed to succeed her.
